alert.note: Alert for Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 8:40PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN ROCK COUNTY THROUGH 930 PM CDT... At 840 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Bassett, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bassett. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 171 and 182. Highway 20 between mile markers 253 and 267. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
